definitions.definition: only for one person or group and not for everyone:
examples: She has a small office that is used for private discussions.

definitions.definition: Private activities involve personal matters or relationships and are not related to your work:
examples: Apparently in interviews he refuses to talk about his private life.

definitions.definition: Private thoughts and opinions are secret and not discussed with other people:
examples: Although I support the project in public, my private opinion is that it will fail.

definitions.definition: A private place is quiet and has no other people to see or hear you:
examples: Is there somewhere private where we can talk?

definitions.definition: A private person does not like to talk about their personal feelings and thoughts:
If you talk to someone or do something in private, you do it without other people being present:
examples: Jamie wants to speak to me in private.

definitions.definition: a soldier of the lowest rank in an army:
